Question: This person owns a house in the Berkshire County town of Washington, Massachusetts.
Hints: This person checked himself out of McLean and, at Kortchmar's urging, moved to New York City to form a band.
Gorilla was followed in 1976 by In the Pocket, this person's last studio album to be released under Warner Bros.
This person decided to try being a solo act and a change of scenery.
